data: The correct address of Precious Ramotswe, Botswana’s foremost solver of problems—in the sense that this was where she could be found between eight in the morning and five in the afternoon, except when she was not there—was The No. 1 Ladies’ Detective Agency, c/o Tlokweng Road Speedy Motors, Gaborone, Botswana.
Botswana | The No. 1 Ladies’ Detective Agency | Tlokweng Road Speedy Motors | Gaborone
The No. 1 Ladies’ Detective Agency | Tlokweng Road Speedy Motors | Gaborone | Botswana
eight in the morning | five in the afternoon
The Miracle at Speedy Motors (No.1 Ladies' Detective Agency, #9)
